title: Cooperation Minister Amit Shah urges sugar mills to diversify ethanol feedstock
description: Amit Shah called on sugar mills to seek alternatives to sugarcane for producing ethanol, aiming to achieve 20% ethanol blending by 2025-26. Speaking at an NFCSF event, he noted that the ethanol blending program has reduced crude oil imports and environmental impact. Shah urged adopting diverse sources for ethanol to foster sustainable energy.
